post.body: it's cause I am an enigma wrapped in a riddle; or something like that. LOL!!
Hell yeah- I am still frozen from the drive home.
- "HI Chad!" and we will see you, Bella, at 10 am then!!
Yep, still definitely up to having you come over for coffee, say around 10 or 11 a.m.?
you never said I had to be nice to go to lunch, Dammit ! If I knew I had to be nice...
best part of yesterday, besides hanging out with you was with the Dragon- watching telly till 4 am. Sometimes he is all I need.
um yeh I need a big stick then & some flame retardant body armor, it will not be pretty. But if he wants to game today...
RUN NOW while you still can - we, those unlucky to already be tainted will be lost but save yourself!
should we be afraid? I THINK NOT!!
we can do the shopping together I guess *sighs* lollollol
sure it does yummy snap peas yummy cherry tomatoes, yummy baby bel cheese, yummy yummy good for my tummy
Wishing all out there in the Twitterverse, a most blessed Yule!
Hating the fact I woke up with a massive sinus headache, GRR!
I wonder how icy the roads will be now on my way into work. Or better yet, in the a.m. when I have to go get groceries before coming home.
wondering how early is too early to start waking up the Dragon; since we did not go to bed until 4 am.
I am now realizing just how cold the corner of the computer room that my desk sits, really is. I am freezing!!!
I hate being thwarted by technology. The new ink just put in printer-printer is now saying is wrong- just when I need to print something
It's official, I screwed up my sleep schedule and missed Bela Fleck by being sickly.
Reading Herman Melville's Benito Cereno. Melville is one dark and twisted dude.
You know nummy snacks nom nom nom
